item.text: Return to the living room, or leave your apartment.
Go back to the living room.
you hate taking the bus. It always stresses you out, but it is much faster, and you can't be late to work. (20 minutes)
Walk to work. This is significantly less stressful than the bus, but takes much longer. (50 minutes)
Look in the fridge for something to eat.
You open up the fridge. You have a few options to choose from, and you know that eating well now will be a good start to your day.
Grab some fruit for breakfast. It's fast and easy, but you'll probably be hungry later.
Sit down for a peanut butter sandwich and toast. Maybe you'll have a glass of milk with that. (10 minutes)
If you've got the time, why not make a big breakfast? Pancakes, eggs, maybe some bacon? You can feel your mouth watering already, and it will definitely leave you feeling great. (30 minutes)
